SAINT.Name: Venerable Fathers slain at the Monastery of Saint Sabbas: John, Sergius, Patrick and others (+796)
Martyr Photina (Svetlana), the Samaritan Woman, her sons, and those with her (+ c.66)
Holy Virgin Martyrs Alexandra, Claudia, Euphrasia, Matrona, Juliania, Euthymia and Theodosia (+310)
St. Nicetas the Confessor the Archbishop of Apollonias in Bithynia (9th C)
Monkmartyr Euphrosynus of Blue Jay Lake, Novgorod (+1612)
